snippet: HBO assumed its familiar role as the early leader in the Emmys race after taking home 15 Creative Arts awards.
abstract: HBO garners 15 Creative Arts awards from the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences in ceremony that is a precursor to the major Emmys broadcast.
lead_paragraph: HBO assumed its familiar role as the early leader in the Emmys race after taking home 15 Creative Arts awards.

headline.main: Emmys Go to Fallon, ‘Orange’ and, Yes, HBO
headline.print_headline: Emmys Go to Fallon, ‘Orange’ and, Yes, HBO
